remarks: Binary relation expressing the dual modular pair property.  This version quantifies an ordering instead of an inference.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dmdbr4 $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A MH* B <-> A. x e. CH ( ( x vH B ) i^i ( A vH B ) ) C_ ( ( ( x vH B ) i^i A ) vH B ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
